description: This file is a test suite for React components, specifically testing route protection logic in a React application using React Testing Library and Jest. It mocks react-router-dom to simulate redirection behavior based on authentication token presence.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Clears local storage before each test to ensure a clean environment.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines a test case that verifies redirection to /login when no authentication token is present.
